section.heading: Payment of sanitary sewer service charges.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Oct. 21, 1975, D.C. Law 1-23, title VII, § 701(c), 22 DCR 2115
repealed pursuant to § 304 of D.C. Law 11-111

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 4(d) of the Confirmation Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-25, March 15, 1999, 46 DCR 2971).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 304 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
